attributes.action: intervene in the racist bullying being permitted by Channel 4 towards Shilpa Shetty on Celebrity Big Brother
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am appalled at the bullying which is allowed to take place in the house against Shilpa and it made me feel very uncomfortable to watch a grown woman brought to tears by the actions of others. I am annoyed that the producers have done nothing to react to this blatent bullying, some of which is of a racist nature. At the very least I would have expected a verbal warning. As these people are being paid by channel 4 they are in fact employees, and if employees behaved in this way in a workplace they would be disciplined and the employer taken to tribunal.
